Tucson puts a gentile hand on Perceptor's shoulder.

" Honestly I don't kno=
w what I am capable of, but this is Rodimus Prime we're trying to save, and=
 no matter what reactions I may have by transfusing a portion of my spark t=
o him, I am willing to do this not only as a comrade, but as a friend, to s=
ave the life of someone who is in desperate need of help.  I promised Rodim=
us Prime that if he needed me, I'd be there, and before he ever fell into t=
he depths of no return, I'd be sure that my hand was down there to reach hi=
s and pull him up from the point of no return.  I will not back away from m=
y promise to him.  I feel as if this is something that my extra power was m=
eant to do.  I can't explain it really, but something else is within me, a =
power I can not describe."

He puts a hand on Talon's and he puts it to his=
 chest.

"Talon, do you feel that?  It's a power I can not describe, but it=
's here, and there's plenty of it to share.  And more than enough for you a=
s well."
